page.title: 12SCHOOL TRIPS THIS YEAR 1985
page.content: This year we had two trips away from school.In April we went to {Charterhouse Outdoor Activity Centre which is run by Somerset L.E.A. We spent 4 days at the centre and went {horse riding,caving,swimming,and alot {of walking!!! We also had to eat food {cooked by Mr Narraway which was not {too bad(!) In June the 4th years went to the {Forest of Dean.}We spent 6 Days there.We stayed in large 6 person tents.The only day in really rained was the day we happened to get a little lost so we all got rather wet as you can imagine.We visited many places along the river Wye including {Tintern abbey and Monmouth.}Richard kept eating the whole of the time we were away,and Tim,well,he just could not stay on his feet. A great time was had by all who went.
